*** Changelog ***

= 3.0.2 - 2023-3-2 =
* Enhancement - Update the plugin to meet the guidance of Wordpress structure & compliance according to Wordpress team's great feedback.

= 3.0.1 - 2023-2-18 =
* Add - New Feature - Seller protection - Integrated with PayPal seller protection more seamlessly. The shop owner can input shipping infor to minimize claims and chargebacks and help prevent merchant fraud.
* Add - Support web – Create support site https://paypal.uin88.com for the customer to get support & document more easily so that the plugin is not just for big key account customer but also all the user who want to use it.

= 2.0.0 - 2022-6-8 =
* Enhancement - Backend interface – Improve backend interace for more users
* Enhancement - Frontend - On single product page & cart page, if it displays default PayPal icons, after the payment is done, the customers will be redirected back to checkout and there could be addtional shipping feeds.
* Fixed – Process existing orders not paid could cause shipping fee issue.

= 1.0.0 - 2022-1-28 =
* Initial release for offline key account usage.
